titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5349) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 21 days.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5349) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 21 days.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-525, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5349 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 187.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 976.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 976.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 210 - 195 (Roll no. 48).
Mr. Arcuri moved to table the motion to reconsider.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 194 (Roll No. 49).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 199 (Roll no. 50).

action.text: Mr. Hastings (WA) moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Arcuri moved to table the motion to reconsider
On motion to table the motion to reconsider Agreed to by recorded vote: (Roll No. 51).

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5349) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 21 days.
